channel.title: Model a completely new area?
channel.description:
Okay, so I want to have a custom home - i real custom home.
Jagex can create new area's, so we can right?
I want to know how I would go about making a new area, setting coords etc.
I mean, say I've found a patch I would like to make a new area on, it's completely black and you can't move unless you noclip, how would I make a floor and walls and make a new area for my home.
I realize this question may only be answerable by a few very knowledgable people, and I haven't set my hopes too high. But if someone can help me out by explaning this, I would appreciate it!
- Surfr

item.title: Model a completely new area?
item.dc:creator: @Surfr Surfr
item.description:
@Surfr wrote:

[quote=“faded vision, post:2, topic:266514”]Its client side, to do with mapdata.

I Dont know anyone who has created mapdata from scratch

You could do it all with objects maybe if u wanted to do server side lol. But it would look fail :\

Cool idea, wonder if someone knows how.[/quote]

Is this the wrong forum section for this question then?

Okay well anyway, you’ve shed some light onto my question, so thank you.

So say Jagex thought up of a new random event and needed to create a new place for it. How would they go about it? Would THEY create mapdata from scratch?

Read full topic

item.description:
@faded_vision wrote:

Its client side, to do with mapdata.

I Dont know anyone who has created mapdata from scratch

You could do it all with objects maybe if u wanted to do server side lol. But it would look fail :\

Cool idea, wonder if someone knows how.
